(Theorem 14.3, auxiliary) The positively homogeneous hull is a proper convex function.

lemma section14_properConvex_posHomHull [TopologicalSpace E] [IsTopologicalAddGroup E] [ContinuousSMul E] [T2Space E] [FiniteDimensional E] [LocallyConvexSpace E] {f : E EReal} (hf : ProperConvexERealFunction (F := E) f) (hf_closed : LowerSemicontinuous f) (hf0 : (0 : EReal) < f 0) (hf0_ltTop : f 0 < ) : ProperConvexERealFunction (F := E) (section14_posHomHull (E := E) f) := by classical let k : E EReal := section14_posHomHull (E := E) f have hk_ne_bot : x : E, k x := section14_posHomHull_ne_bot (E := E) (f := f) hf hf_closed hf0 hf0_ltTop have hk0 : k 0 = 0 := section14_posHomHull_zero (E := E) (f := f) (hf0 := hf0) (hf0_ltTop := hf0_ltTop) (hf0_ne_bot := hf.1.1 0) refine ?_, ?_ refine ?_, ?_ intro x simpa [k] using hk_ne_bot x refine 0, ?_ -- `k 0 = 0` is finite. simp [k, hk0] -- Convexity from subadditivity + positive homogeneity. intro x y a b ha hb hab by_cases ha0 : a = 0 subst ha0 have hb1 : b = 1 := by linarith subst hb1 simp by_cases hb0 : b = 0 subst hb0 have ha1 : a = 1 := by linarith subst ha1 simp have ha_pos : 0 < a := lt_of_le_of_ne ha (Ne.symm ha0) have hb_pos : 0 < b := lt_of_le_of_ne hb (Ne.symm hb0) have hsub := section14_posHomHull_subadd (E := E) (f := f) hf hf_closed hf0 hf0_ltTop (a x) (b y) have hhom_a : k (a x) = (a : EReal) * k x := section14_posHomHull_smul (E := E) (f := f) ha_pos x have hhom_b : k (b y) = (b : EReal) * k y := section14_posHomHull_smul (E := E) (f := f) hb_pos y -- Combine. simpa [k, hhom_a, hhom_b, add_assoc, add_left_comm, add_comm] using hsub

(Theorem 14.3, auxiliary) Antitonicity of the Fenchel conjugate in the primal function.

(Theorem 14.3, auxiliary) The Fenchel triconjugate with respect to evaluation satisfies for a proper function Unknown identifier `f`f.

lemma section14_fenchelConjugate_triconjugate_eq_of_proper {E F : Type*} [AddCommGroup E] [Module E] [AddCommGroup F] [Module F] (p : E [] F [] ) {f : E EReal} (hf : ProperERealFunction f) (hdom : y0 : F, fenchelConjugateBilin (E := E) p f y0 < ) : fenchelConjugateBilin (E := E) p (fenchelConjugateBilin (E := F) p.flip (fenchelConjugateBilin (E := E) p f)) = fenchelConjugateBilin (E := E) p f := by classical -- Write `f*` and `f***` and use the order-reversing property of `*` together with the -- biconjugate inequality. apply funext intro y apply le_antisymm -- `f*** f*` is the biconjugate inequality applied to `f*`. have hfstar_ne_bot : y : F, fenchelConjugateBilin (E := E) p f y := section14_fenchelConjugate_ne_bot_of_proper (p := p) hf have hfstar : ProperERealFunction (fenchelConjugateBilin (E := E) p f) := by refine hfstar_ne_bot, ?_ rcases hdom with y0, hy0 exact y0, ne_of_lt hy0 -- Apply `(f*)** f*` with pairing `p.flip`. simpa [fenchelConjugateBilin] using section14_fenchelBiconjugate_le_of_proper (p := p.flip) (f := fenchelConjugateBilin (E := E) p f) hfstar y -- `f* f***` by antitonicity and the biconjugate inequality `(f*)* f`. have hbi : x : E, fenchelConjugateBilin (E := F) p.flip (fenchelConjugateBilin (E := E) p f) x f x := section14_fenchelBiconjugate_le_of_proper (p := p) (f := f) hf -- Antitonicity gives `f* (f**)* = f***`. exact (section14_fenchelConjugate_anti (p := p) (f := fenchelConjugateBilin (E := F) p.flip (fenchelConjugateBilin (E := E) p f)) (g := f) hbi y)

(Theorem 14.3, auxiliary) The Fenchel biconjugate of the positively homogeneous hull is a proper convex function.

kstar ) kcl x := by unfold kcl kstar -- `p.flip x = p x `. have : ((p x : EReal) - fenchelConjugateBilin p k ) fenchelConjugateBilin p.flip (fenchelConjugateBilin p k) x := by unfold fenchelConjugateBilin exact le_sSup , rfl simpa using this intro hxbot have hle' : ((p x - r0 : ) : EReal) ( : EReal) := by have hle' := hle simp [hxbot, hr0, sub_eq_add_neg] at hle' exact (not_le_of_gt (EReal.bot_lt_coe (p x - r0))) hle' have hk0 : k 0 = 0 := section14_posHomHull_zero (E := E) (f := f) (hf0 := hf0) (hf0_ltTop := hf0_ltTop) (hf0_ne_bot := hf.1.1 0) have hkcl_le_k : x : E, kcl x k x := section14_fenchelBiconjugate_le_of_proper (p := p) (f := k) hk_proper refine ?_, ?_ refine ?_, ?_ intro x simpa [kcl] using hkcl_ne_bot x refine 0, ?_ -- `kcl 0 k 0 = 0` implies `kcl 0` is finite. have hkcl0_le : kcl 0 k 0 := hkcl_le_k 0 have : kcl 0 < := lt_of_le_of_lt (hkcl0_le.trans_eq hk0) (EReal.coe_lt_top 0) exact ne_of_lt this -- Convexity of `kcl` as a supremum of affine functions. intro x y a b ha hb hab have haE : (0 : EReal) (a : EReal) := by simpa [EReal.coe_nonneg] using ha have hbE : (0 : EReal) (b : EReal) := by simpa [EReal.coe_nonneg] using hb have habE : (a : EReal) + (b : EReal) = (1 : EReal) := by simpa [EReal.coe_add] using congrArg (fun r : => (r : EReal)) hab -- Rewrite `kcl` as an indexed supremum. have hkcl_repr : kcl = fun x : E => : Module.Dual E, ((p x : EReal) - kstar ) := by funext x classical simp [kcl, kstar, fenchelConjugateBilin, sSup_range] have hkcl_app (z : E) : kcl z = : Module.Dual E, ((p z : EReal) - kstar ) := by simpa using congrArg (fun g : E EReal => g z) hkcl_repr -- Reduce to bounding each term in the `iSup`. rw [hkcl_app (a x + b y)] refine iSup_le ?_ intro have hx_le : ((p x : EReal) - kstar ) simpa [hkcl_app y] using this have hterm : ((p (a x + b y) : EReal) - kstar ) = (a : EReal) * ((p x : EReal) - kstar ) + (b : EReal) * ((p y : EReal) - kstar ) := by -- Use linearity of `` and distribute the scalars across the subtraction term-by-term. have hlin : (p (a x + b y) : EReal) = (a : EReal) * (p x : EReal) + (b : EReal) * (p y : EReal) := by -- `p z = z`. have hlin : (p (a x + b y) : ) = a * (p x : ) + b * (p y : ) := by simp [p, LinearMap.apply, map_add, map_smul, smul_eq_mul] -- Cast to `EReal`. simp [EReal.coe_add, EReal.coe_mul] -- Prove the identity by rewriting the right-hand side. have ha_ne_top : (a : EReal) := by simp have hb_ne_top : (b : EReal) := by simp symm calc (a : EReal) * ((p x : EReal) - kstar ) + (b : EReal) * ((p y : EReal) - kstar ) = (a : EReal) * ((p x : EReal) + (-kstar )) + (b : EReal) * ((p y : EReal) + (-kstar )) := by simp [sub_eq_add_neg] _ = ((a : EReal) * (p x : EReal) + (a : EReal) * (-kstar )) + ((b : EReal) * (p y : EReal) + (b : EReal) * (-kstar )) := by rw [EReal.left_distrib_of_nonneg_of_ne_top haE ha_ne_top (p x : EReal) (-kstar )] rw [EReal.left_distrib_of_nonneg_of_ne_top hbE hb_ne_top (p y : EReal) (-kstar )] _ = ((a : EReal) * (p x : EReal) + (b : EReal) * (p y : EReal)) + ((a : EReal) * (-kstar ) + (b : EReal) * (-kstar )) := by simp [add_assoc, add_left_comm, add_comm] _ = ((a : EReal) * (p x : EReal) + (b : EReal) * (p y : EReal)) + (((a : EReal) + (b : EReal)) * (-kstar )) := by congr 1 simpa [add_comm, add_left_comm, add_assoc] using (EReal.right_distrib_of_nonneg (ha := haE) (hb := hbE) (c := -kstar )).symm _ = ((a : EReal) * (p x : EReal) + (b : EReal) * (p y : EReal)) + (-kstar ) := by simp [habE] _ = ((a : EReal) * (p x : EReal) + (b : EReal) * (p y : EReal)) - kstar := by simp [sub_eq_add_neg] _ = (p (a x + b y) : EReal) - kstar := by simp -- Apply monotonicity after rewriting the term. have hax : (a : EReal) * ((p x : EReal) - kstar ) (a : EReal) * kcl x := mul_le_mul_of_nonneg_left hx_le haE have hby : (b : EReal) * ((p y : EReal) - kstar ) (b : EReal) * kcl y := mul_le_mul_of_nonneg_left hy_le hbE -- Combine. -- (Use `hterm` to rewrite the left-hand side.) have haux : (a : EReal) * ((p x : EReal) - kstar ) + (b : EReal) * ((p y : EReal) - kstar ) (a : EReal) * kcl x + (b : EReal) * kcl y := add_le_add hax hby exact (calc ((p (a x + b y) : EReal) - kstar ) = (a : EReal) * ((p x : EReal) - kstar ) + (b : EReal) * ((p y : EReal) - kstar ) := hterm _ (a : EReal) * kcl x + (b : EReal) * kcl y := haux)
